text: Tang Lingling (born 8 March 1987) is a Chinese karateka. She is a two-time silver medalist at the Asian Games in 2014 and 2018. In both finals she lost against Guzaliya Gafurova of Kazakhstan. She also won one of the bronze medals in the women's kumite +68 kg at the 2010 Asian Games held in Guangzhou, China. In 2013, she won the gold medal in the women's 68 kg event at the 2013 Asian Karate Championships held in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. == References == == External links == * Category:Living people Category:1987 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Chinese female karateka Category:Karateka at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Karateka at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Karateka at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2010 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2014 Asian Games Category:Medalists at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games medalists in karate Category:Asian Games silver medalists for China Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for China Category:Asian Games competitors for China
title: Tang Lingling
